Some of you are just dense. Luden's is *on-spell*, specifically *not* on-hit. Stattik Shiv is *on-hit*, specifically *not* on-spell. The whole point is that they are not supposed to stack. At all.

Luden's procs on spells, not magic damage. The only damaging spell in Gangplank's kit is his R, and thus is the only thing Luden's works with (Gangplank's Q is treated as a melee autoattack; hence it applies Tiamat, can crit, etc.).

As a side note, Ezreal's Q will not proc Luden's as it only applies on hit effects, not spell effects.

Parrrrly for all intents and purposes is an auto attack. It doesn't slow if you have Rylias either.

Ezreal's Q is a spell that scales with his damage stat, and applies on hit effects.
It would be really nice for it to work with Parrrley. You probably already know, but it *does* happen to proc from his Cannon Barrage. Makes for some pretty nasty global presence :3

The curse of abilities that are treated as auto-attacks for the purpose of applying on-hit effects: They're treated as auto-attacks for the purposes of spell effects like Spell Vamp, Rylie's, Liandry's, and and Luden's.
